Package model

package model
The model package contains the core data models for the Jackaroo game. It defines fundamental game elements such as player attributes, card types, and marble colours.

Key Components:

  • Colour - Enum representing the four colours of the marbles (RED, GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW).

This package serves as the data layer, providing essential models for use by the engine and engine.board packages.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    model.card
    The model.card package contains classes representing the cards used in the Jackaroo game.
    model.player
    The model.player package contains classes related to player management in the Jackaroo game.
  • Enum Classes
    Class
    Description
    Colour
    Represents the four possible colours of the marbles in the Jackaroo game.
